alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 9:29AM CDT until June 18 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... South central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 929 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Calvert, or 14 miles east of Citronelle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McCullough, Mount Vernon, Calvert, McIntosh, I65 And CR 1 and Poarch Creek Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
